item.title: Seal soapstone carving
item.description: Week 5: Royal Green. This art was lovingly created using: soapstone carving. Artist’s Notes Although the prompt centres around green jade, I carved a piece of soapstone under the pretense of it as white jade. The design is influenced by a well known chinese poem: Quiet Night Thoughts by LiBai, it describes looking up at the moon and thinking of oneâ€™s family at home. I have lightly inked the carving to contrast the details.
